parts.text: {"word":"stomach","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"胃","english_definition":"the organ in the body where food is digested, or the front part of the body containing this organ.","examples":[{"sentence":"I have a stomach ache.","translation":"お腹が痛い。"},{"sentence":"Food passes from the esophagus to the stomach.","translation":"食べ物は食道から胃へと移動する。"},{"sentence":"He has a sensitive stomach.","translation":"彼は胃が弱い。"}],"collocations":["stomach ache (腹痛)","stomach cancer (胃がん)","empty stomach (空腹)","full stomach (満腹)","upset stomach (胃の不調)","growling stomach (お腹がグーグー鳴る)"],"synonyms":["belly","abdomen","tummy (主に子供)","gut","paunch"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"腹部、おなか","english_definition":"the abdomen or belly.","examples":[{"sentence":"He was punched in the stomach.","translation":"彼は腹を殴られた。"},{"sentence":"She lay on her stomach.","translation":"彼女はうつ伏せに寝た。"}],"collocations":["lie on one's stomach (うつ伏せになる)","punch someone in the stomach (人の腹を殴る)"],"synonyms":["abdomen","belly","tummy"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"我慢する、耐える、受け入れる","english_definition":"to tolerate or endure something unpleasant.","examples":[{"sentence":"I can't stomach his arrogance.","translation":"彼の傲慢さには我慢できない。"},{"sentence":"She couldn't stomach the violence in the movie.","translation":"彼女はその映画の暴力シーンに耐えられなかった。"},{"sentence":"He found it hard to stomach the criticism.","translation":"彼はその批判を受け入れるのが難しいと感じた。"}],"collocations":["can't stomach (～に我慢できない)","stomach the thought of (～という考えに耐えられない)"],"synonyms":["tolerate","endure","bear","put up with","stand","accept"],"antonyms":["reject","refuse","decline"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「estomac」から派生し、さらにラテン語の「stomachus」に由来する。元々は「食道」や「胃」を意味し、ギリシャ語の「stomakhos」（口、食道）から来ている。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈstʌmək/","syllables":"stu-mack"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"stomachs","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["stomach","stomachs"],"past_simple":"stomached","past_participle":"stomached","present_participle":"stomaching"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**stomach**」は、名詞としては「胃」または「腹部」を指し、動詞としては「我慢する」「耐える」という意味を持ちます。名詞の「胃」の意味では、消化器官の一部を指し、医学的な文脈でも日常会話でも使われます。「腹部」の意味では、体の部位を指します。動詞の「我慢する」の意味では、不快なことや嫌なことを受け入れることを表し、しばしば否定的な感情を伴います。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I have pain in my stomach's area.","correct":"✓ I have pain in my stomach area.","note":"所有格の 's は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I can't stomach to see him.","correct":"✓ I can't stomach seeing him.","note":"動詞として使う場合、後に続く動詞は動名詞 (V-ing) になります。または、that節を使うこともできます (I can't stomach that he is so arrogant.)。"},{"incorrect":"✗ My stomach is very big, I need to diet.","correct":"✓ My belly is very big, I need to diet.","note":"「お腹が出ている」というニュアンスで「腹部」を指す場合は、"belly" の方がより自然です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["stomachic (形容詞: 胃の、胃薬の; 名詞: 胃薬)","stomachless (形容詞: 胃のない)"],"idioms_phrases":["have butterflies in one's stomach (緊張する、ドキドキする)","turn one's stomach (吐き気を催させる)","a knot in one's stomach (不安や心配で胃が締め付けられる感じ)","stick in one's stomach (心に残る、忘れられない)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1 (名詞の基本的な意味)、B2 (動詞の意味)","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**stomach**」は、食べ物を消化する「胃」という臓器を指す言葉です。また、「お腹」という意味もあります。動詞としては、「我慢する」という意味で使われます。例えば、「I can't **stomach** his behavior.（彼の行動には我慢できない）」のように使います。日常会話でもよく使う単語なので、基本的な意味を覚えておきましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The doctor examined his **stomach**.","translation":"医者は彼の胃を診察した。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"胃"},{"sentence":"She felt a pain in her **stomach**.","translation":"彼女は腹部に痛みを感じた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"腹部"},{"sentence":"I can't **stomach** the taste of liver.","translation":"レバーの味がどうしても我慢できない。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"我慢する"},{"sentence":"He has a strong **stomach** and can eat anything.","translation":"彼は胃が丈夫で何でも食べられる。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"胃"},{"sentence":"The thought of losing her made his **stomach** churn.","translation":"彼女を失うという考えは彼の胃をむかむかさせた。","type":"noun (idiomatic)","meaning_category":"胃 (比喩的)"}]}
